channel.title: I need help on my server!
channel.description: it keeps making me unable to log in and deleting my information when i log out. i dont know why but it also says exception in thread "main" java.lang.stringindexoutofboundsexception: string index out of range: 2 at java.lang.string.getchars<unknown source> at java.io.bufferedwriter.write<unknownsource> at playerhandler.savechar<playerhandler.java:388> at playerhandler.process<playerhandler.java:159> at server.main<server.java:53> if any1 has any advice for what is wrong or how to fix it please tell me

item.title: I need help on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Well, it’s not saving cause it’s getting an exception while trying to. You probably edited something, and now it doesn’t work. My only suggestion is to get another server or if you downloaded your server in RAR/ZIP form, and you still have it, then re-extract it.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help on my server!

item.title: I need help on my server!
item.dc:creator: @dimize dimize
item.description:
@dimize wrote:

it keeps making me unable to log in and deleting my information when i log out. i dont know why but it also says
exception in thread “main” java.lang.stringindexoutofboundsexception: string index out of range: 2
at java.lang.string.getchars
at java.io.bufferedwriter.write
at playerhandler.savecharplayerhandler.java:388
at playerhandler.processplayerhandler.java:159
at server.mainserver.java:53
if any1 has any advice for what is wrong or how to fix it please tell me

Read full topic
